qas.question: How many self-identified LGB people live in the New York metropolitan area?

context: The New York metropolitan area is home to a self-identifying gay and bisexual community estimated at <a0_0><a3_0>568,903<a3_0/><a0_0/> individuals, the largest in the United States and one of the world's largest.
